passive.name: WHISPER
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) WHISPER
                                Jhin's hand cannon, Whisper, carries 4 shots before needing to be reloaded and fires at a fixed rate. (Attack speed will be converted into Attack Damage). The final bullet will critically strike and deal additional 11% missing Health physical damage (). Whenever Whisper crits, Jhin gains a burst of 15% movement speed (15% + 0.4% per 1% bonus ) for 2s.Attack Damage scales with Critical Strike Chance and bonus Attack Speed.

q.name: (Q) DANCING GRENADE
q.description:
(Q) DANCING GRENADE
 6.5/6/5.5/5s   45/50/55/60 
                                
                                
                                Launches a magical cartridge at an enemy, dealing 66 physical damage (45/80/115/150 + 35/45/55/65%  + 60% ) before bouncing to a nearby target that has not yet been hit. It can hit up to 4 targets and gains 44% damage each time it kills.

w.name: (W) DEADLY FLOURISH
w.description:
(W) DEADLY FLOURISH
 12s   60/65/70/75 
                                
                                
                                Fires a long range shot that stops on the first champion hit, dealing 84 physical damage (60/100/140/180 + 40% ) to it, and 75% of that damage to minions and monsters hit along the way. If the target champion was struck by Jhin, Jhin's alles, or Lotus Traps within the last 4s, they are rooted for 1.25/1.5/1.75/2s and Jhin gains Movement Speed as though he had crit them.
notes: range shot that stops on the first champion hit, dealing 84 physical damage (60/100/140/180 + 40% ) to it, and 75% of that damage to minions and monsters hit along the way

e.name: (E) CAPTIVE AUDIENCE
e.description:
(E) CAPTIVE AUDIENCE
 2s   35/40/45/50 
                                
                                
                                Places an invisible Lotus Trap that reveals nearby enemies when walked over. it slows enemies by 30% before dealing 90 magic damage (20/100/180/260 + 120%  + 100% ). Subsequent hits deal 65% damage.When Jhin kills an enemy champion, a Lotus Trap will spawn and detonate where they were killed.Lotus Trap cooldown: 20/18/16/14 сек.Deals 65% damage to non-champion enemies and champions that have recently been damaged by another trap.

r.name: (R) CURTAIN CALL
r.description:
(R) CURTAIN CALL
 80/70/60s   100 
                                
                                
                                Channels to fire 4 super shots at extreme range in a cone.The shots stop on the first champion hit, slowing it by 80% for 0.75s and dealing 90 physical damage (75/150/225 + 25% ), increased by 3% for each 1% health the target is missing.The 4th shot crits for 200% damage.Tap the cancel button to cancel the channel.
